en.pageDescription: Learn about MEDO-FREIGHT and our offices in Europe and Syria
en.intro: We are a European shipping company based in the Netherlands, specialized in consolidating and shipping LCL partial parcels from all European countries, in addition to FCL sea freight services to the Middle East and worldwide. We provide integrated logistics services with full focus on accuracy, security, and punctuality.
en.description: We fully understand the challenges of shipping to Syria: restrictions, inspections, different systems, and supply delays. That's why we built an integrated shipping system with a clear and simple process, starting from receiving the parcel in Europe... and ending with its arrival to the customer's hand inside Syria with complete transparency.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the most trusted and efficient company for shipping from Europe to Syria, and to provide customers with an easy, fast, and clear shipping experience from start to finish.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To provide our customers with a shipping experience that deserves trust: clarity, commitment, quality service, and ease of follow-up... without complexity or unrealistic promises.

items.title: LCL Partial Shipping
items.description: Consolidating parcels from all over Europe inside our center in the Netherlands, then shipping them in our own container to Syria. Perfect service for individuals, companies, and small orders.

items.title: FCL Shipping (Full Containers)
items.description: Providing 20ft, 40ft, and 40 HC containers for industrial, commercial materials and general cargo to the Middle East and worldwide.

items.title: Official Documentation
items.description: We issue certificate of origin, commercial invoice, packing list, and European export documents officially and documented in compliance with customs requirements.

items.title: Storage and Inspection Services
items.description: Receiving, sorting, inspection, weighing, photographing, and packaging parcels inside our center in the Netherlands.

items.title: Delivery Inside Syria
items.description: We provide a delivery network inside most governorates through our local partners.

items.title: Clear Shipping Path
items.description: From the moment of receiving the parcel until delivery

items.title: Transparent Prices
items.description: Calculated automatically via the website without surprises

items.title: Full Arabic Support
items.description: Via phone, WhatsApp, and email

items.title: Accurate Schedules
items.description: For containers, and continuous tracking service

items.title: 15 Years Experience
items.description: In sea freight and international trade

items.title: Fixed Consolidation Center
items.description: In the Netherlands with clear working hours and daily reception

cta.title: We Are Here to Make Your Shipping Journey Easier
cta.subtitle: From Europe to Syria... a long road, but with MEDO-FREIGHT.EU the process becomes simpler, faster, and safer.

largeParcels.title: Personal & Commercial Parcel Collection Center
largeParcels.description: For large parcels weighing 50â€“100 kg and above, per parcel or pallet

smallParcels.title: Small Parcel Collection Center
smallParcels.description: For small parcels weighing up to 20 kg per parcel
smallParcels.companyName: Eurobox Self Storage â€“ Bergen op Zoom
